meanings.definition: Huffing (verb): to breathe heavily and noisily
meanings.sent1: After running up the stairs, he was huffing and puffing.
meanings.sent2: She was huffing from the effort of carrying the heavy boxes.
meanings.sent3: The little dog was huffing as it tried to keep up with its owner on the walk.
meanings.sent4: The old steam engine was huffing and chugging along the tracks.
meanings.sent5: The exhausted hiker was huffing as he reached the mountain peak.

meanings.definition: Huffing (noun): the act of inhaling fumes to achieve a high
meanings.sent1: The dangers of huffing household chemicals are well-known.
meanings.sent2: Teenagers sometimes experiment with huffing to experience a temporary euphoria.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit humorously portrayed a group of friends accidentally huffing paint fumes.
meanings.sent4: In the artist's studio, the colors seemed to dance together, creating a huffing of inspiration.
meanings.sent5: The forbidden allure of huffing substances can lead to serious health consequences.
